name: Dino Dash
blurb: Outrun volcanoes in this prehistoric runner. Collect eggs and avoid obstacles!

name: Circuit Circus
blurb: Solve electrical puzzles to power a traveling circus. Features realistic physics and quirky characters.

name: Mail Mayhem
blurb: Deliver letters in a chaotic town. Your bike is your best friend.

name: Wizard's Widget
blurb: Craft magical items to solve villagers' problems. Each combination creates unexpected results!

name: Deep Sea Diner
blurb: Cook for aquatic creatures under time pressure. The deeper you go, the stranger the ingredients!

name: Code Cowboys
blurb: A wild west adventure where you solve problems by writing simple code. Teaches programming basics through cowboy metaphors.

name: Penguin Post
blurb: Help penguins deliver mail across Antarctica. Watch out for seals!

name: Alchemy Acres
blurb: Farm magical plants and brew potions. The more exotic your crops, the more powerful your concoctions!

name: Bug Brigade
blurb: Lead an ant colony to victory. Strategy meets simulation in this tiny world.

name: Space Janitors
blurb: Clean up space stations while avoiding alien encounters. A humorous take on mundane work in extraordinary settings.

name: Tiny Titans
blurb: Control miniature giants in a normal-sized world. Everything is your playground!

name: Museum Midnight
blurb: When the museum closes, the exhibits come alive! Solve puzzles by combining artifacts' powers.

name: Cloud Keepers
blurb: Maintain the world's weather system. Balance sunshine and storms to keep everyone happy.

name: Pixel Pirates
blurb: Retro-style naval battles with customizable ships. Upgrade your vessel and recruit quirky crew members.

name: Doodle Dash
blurb: Race through hand-drawn worlds. The more you play, more levels unlock!

name: Time Tailor
blurb: Sew time itself to fix historical anomalies. A unique mix of fashion and time travel puzzles.

name: Ghost Garage
blurb: Repair haunted vehicles. Each car has its own personality and backstory!

name: Library Legends
blurb: Battle literary villains in this book-themed RPG. Your weapon? Knowledge!

name: Bubble Trouble
blurb: Pop bubbles to solve physics puzzles. Simple mechanics with surprising depth.

name: Jungle Journal
blurb: Document exotic creatures in this relaxing exploration game. Your notebook is your most important tool.
